name: VirtualBus Texture Description File
summary: Learn about .TS1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The file Desc.ts1 is the file used for setting bus textures. This file is sometimes edited by players that want to create custom bus packages.
NOTE: VirtualBus uses the .3DS format for models.

description: Vehicle description file used by VirtualBus, a free bus driving simulation game; saves references to textures (2D graphics files) that are overlaid on the 3D vehicle model; also called a "skin" description file, since it configures the graphics for how the external surface area of the bus is displayed.
